name: Exchange
overview: A game of the "Cassette 50" collection. A game based on the popular TV game countdown. You first may choose the number of letters you wish to play with. Type in the number and hit return. A maximum of 14 letters is recommended, but 8 is the usual number. Then you may choose vowels or consonants one at at time by pressing the V or C key. Then you must make a word from the available letters.
